sentences.en: Desire and fear are the weft and warp of living, and both are made of pain.
sentences.cn: 人生为欲望恐惧的纵横交错编织而成, 而两者都是痛苦.

sentences.en: Inter woven from asbestos dust free warp and weft yarns.
sentences.cn: 本产品适用石棉经纬交织而成.

sentences.en: It is one of the main equipment for developing weft - knitted velvet stuff.
sentences.cn: 是纬编针织天鹅绒产品开发的主要设备之一.

sentences.en: Picking: passing the weft thread , which traverses across the fabric, through the shed.
sentences.cn: 引纬运动: 将纬纱沿织物横向引过梭口.

sentences.en: Regardless of the weft being woven, the machine adjusts every insertion for minimal air consumption.
sentences.cn: 无论纬纱是否织了, 织机消耗最少的空气来调整每一次的引纬运动.

sentences.en: The article presents a new way for weft insertion motion on rapier weaving machine.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出了一种新颖的剑杆织机电子引纬方法.

sentences.en: The balance between the warp and weft crimps near the fell is therefore artificial.
sentences.cn: 织口附近经纬纱屈曲程度的平衡是可以控制的.

sentences.en: The performance of weft yarns of medium and fine count from different mills is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了不同工厂的高中低支纬纱的性能.

sentences.en: The skewness or bending of Weft yarn is unavoidable in finishing process of printing and dyeing.
sentences.cn: 织物在印染过程中,纬纱歪斜或弯曲是不可避免的.

sentences.en: The term weft is taken from weaving terminology.
sentences.cn: 纬纱这一术语是来自机织工艺.

sentences.en: Therefrom, the maximum actual weight of double weft weave with different covering weaves can be obtained.
sentences.cn: 求出了不同表组织的重纬组织所能达到的实际最大重量.

sentences.en: This velocity achieves a certain average value along the weft insertion.
sentences.cn: 这速度达到一定的平均价值沿引纬.

sentences.en: Usage: This detector is applied to plastic looms for stopping operation in case of broken weft and weft-out. It is composed of signal emitter, receiver and controller.
sentences.cn: 用途：本检测器用于塑料园织机在断纬、完纬时控制主机停车之功能。它由信号发射器， 信号接收器和控制器三部分组成。

sentences.en: Used for determine the and weft count of all types of fabrics.
sentences.cn: 用于测定各种织物的经纬密度.

sentences.en: Used for determine the warp and weft count of all types of fabrics.
sentences.cn: 用于测定各种织物的径纬密度.

sentences.en: With the decrease in weft diameter, the insertion force also decreases.
sentences.cn: 随着减少纬纱直径, 插入力也下降.

trans.tran_cn: 织物，信号旗，求救信号，纬，纬起圈
